channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Coffee With Cardamom
channel.desc: Drama, History 2021 Anna tries to resist her family's pressuring attempts to marry a wealthy tradesman. Later, she realizes that she is right when her belief in love is confirmed by the appearance of Count Adam in the city. Pavlo Aldoshyn, Olena Lavrenyuk, Pawel Delag, Yaroslav Shinder, Taras Tsimbalyuk, Bartek Kasprzykowski, Slava Babenkov, Irina Gromozda, Simor Glasenko.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Waiting For The Barbarians
channel.desc: Drama, History 2019 Peace and security reign in an empire in the desert until Colonel Joll comes to torture and cruelty the simple inhabitants. The Magistrate tries to protect his empire, but he gets attacked, as the inhabitants believe that he is on the enemy's side. Mark Rylance, Johnny Depp, Robert Pattinson, Greta Scacchi, David Dencik, Ciro Guerra, J.M. Coetzee.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Hollywood On Set
channel.desc: Entertainment, Debate, People 2003 The host presents extensive footage and commentary from the making of major Hollywood productions, highlighting what makes a blockbuster and what elements determine its success, in addition to introspective interviews with actors and filmmakers. Angela Valley, Michelle Blenker, Michael Keaton, Oscar Isaac, Anya Taylor-Joy, Keri Russell, Jason Momoa, David Freydt, Paul Wynne, Paul Wynne, Anya Taylor Joy, Janett Hermosillo, Ann-Marie Lariccia, Martin Saint Charles, Reginald de Guillebon.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Shalyapin
channel.desc: Music, Biography, Drama 2023 Depicting the extraordinary life of Feodor Chaliapin, a renowned Russian opera icon who triumphed over adversity to achieve global recognition in the realm of music. Egor Anashkin, Timur Ezugbaya, Natalya Nazarova, Yulia Snigir, Aleksandr Gorbatov, Aleksandr Yatsenko, Katerina Shpitsa, Irina Pegova.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Unsane
channel.desc: Horror, Drama, Thriller 2018 After being involuntarily admitted to a mental health facility, Sawyer Valentini uncovers that a staff member is a menacing stalker. Desperate to validate her sanity, she must act quickly to avoid falling victim to his threats. Claire Foy , Joshua Leonard, Jay Pharoah, Juno Temple, Colin Woodell, Steven Soderbergh, Jonathan Bernstein, James Greer.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: The Third Murder
channel.desc: Crime, Drama, Mystery 2017 An experienced attorney defends a murder suspect who openly confesses, yet as he delves into the case, he begins to question his client's guilt, uncovering hidden truths. Hirokazu Koreeda, Hirokazu Koreeda, Masaharu Fukuyama, Koji Yakusho, Suzu Hirose, Shinnosuke Mitsushima, Mikako Ichikawa.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Hollywood News Feed
channel.desc: Arts, Debate, Newscast 2012 The entertainment industry shines equally with all its colors in Hollywood behind the scenes as it does on screen, with all the breaking scandals, gossip, relationships, and the making of award shows. Sarah Toce, Sarah Toce, David Freydt, Martin Saint Charles.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: The War Below
channel.desc: War, Drama, History 2021 During WWI, Colonel Norton Griffiths devised a plan in which a group of miners were assigned to dig beneath the disputed area of no man's Land and lay bombs in an attempt to break the deadly stalemate at the Battle of Messines with the Germans. Tom Goodman-Hill, Sam Hazeldine, Kris Hitchen, Andrew Scarborough, Elliot James Langridge, J.P. Watts, J.P. Watts.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Captain Phillips
channel.desc: Action, Biography, Crime, Thriller 2013 Somali pirates kidnap an American ship and hold Captain Richard Phillips and others as hostages. Phillips becomes a hero as he succeeded in rescuing himself and others. Barkhad Abdi, Tom Hanks, Barkhad Abdirahman, Catherine Keener , Michael Chernus, Paul Greengrass, Billy Ray, Catherine Keener.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Dubai Eye On Dubai One
channel.desc: Entertainment, Newscast, Magazine 2000 Brandy Scott, Richard Dean and Tom Urquhart present the latest headlines, followed by in-depth discussions on current affairs and interviews with the local and international figures most knowledgeable about them. Brandy Scott, Richard Dean, Tom Urquhart.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: The Tomorrow Man
channel.desc: People, Romance, Drama 2019 Ed spends his days bracing for an apocalypse that might never occur, and Ronnie fills her home with items she'll likely never put to use. In spite of their contrasting lifestyles, they're both ready to see if love can bloom between them. John Lithgow, Blythe Danner, Derek Cecil, Katie Aselton, Sophie Thatcher, Noble Jones, Noble Jones.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: DXB Today
channel.desc: Cooking, Entertainment, Music, Arts, Fashion Presenters dive into the various facets of life in Dubai, reviewing reports from lifestyle and fashion trends to the latest news, where they also have exclusive interviews with celebrities.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Desperate Mrs. Seonju
channel.desc: Romance, Western, Drama, Family 2024 Pi Seon Ju, a dedicated interior designer, is married to Jeon Nam Jin, an ambitious architect, who insists on ending the marriage after he infatuated with Jin Sang A. Following their divorce, Pi Seon Ju resolves to rebuild her life from scratch. Shim Yi-yeong, Song Chang-ui, Choi Jeong-yun, Kang Woo Yeon, Derek Chouinard, Kim Heung Dong, Seo Jung.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Charming The Hearts Of Men
channel.desc: Romance, Drama, History 2021 Against the backdrop of discrimination against women in the early 1960s, Grace Jordan struggles to provide future generations of women with opportunities through her alliance with congress. Anna Friel, Kelsey Grammer, Starletta DuPois, Pauline Dyer, Aml Ameen, S.E. DeRose, S.E. DeRose.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Grand Designs
channel.desc: Culture, People, Design Presenter Kevin McCloud follows and meets some intelligent and creative individuals who can build their dream homes. They have large spaces and contemporary furnishings. Robert Gaukroger, Kevin McCloud, Jeremy Till, Tom Raffield, Danielle Raffield, Ned Williams, Kevin McCloud.
